description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.N9OBPDwVc7mJk6L3]{Quartermaster}

You have learned to efficiently create clothing, shelter, and other amenities useful for your troops in the field, maintaining health and morale even in difficult times. You can use Profession (quartermaster) to craft the items listed below, even without access to a workshop. Treat your number of ranks in the Profession (quartermaster) skill as if it were 5 higher for the purpose of determining crafting time for these items.

Food and Drink: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.HR97t8Ay34JaOcmY]{Intoxicant (minor)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.rAOula25Uqzzpsx1]{field ration}, meal (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.gVY1amatMKF3yulF]{poor} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.LNdt7djQIqh8RbWm]{common}).

Personal Items: Backpack (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.dcv9AivhC4IRGMp4]{consumer} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.7ZkTZj58lPFE8bZ7]{industrial}), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.62ff45eQdRwIE4cK]{bonding epoxy}, clothing (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.BUKPrUKmcnckTJEW]{environmental}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.vv3Uw4rufnkbDhhi]{everyday}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.RixS54YHX2X2lcyt]{travel}), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.Xe6dS7O0FWMfUr1x]{gear clamp}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.qgY6jRuXMLKQKZRn]{hygiene kit}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.zOvF12YES7pyom6I]{tent (mass produced)}.

Technological Items: Cable line (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.oAkdDFxOksvO88bU]{titanium alloy} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.jFDzyJKDSHAB0zEV]{adamantine alloy}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.VwjSB4FlHBKp9Em4]{detonator}, lock (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.JwR7JIlRFMOQF7Kj]{simple}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.2XcbR3R3eI13MbQ3]{average}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.YfHTsOrXK0riUTil]{good}), portable light (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.qV4dpKH1BVL31rgB]{beacon}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.Wn8wvrMD7xtQD7hU]{flashlight}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.ain1fERsmFL4WKgx]{lantern}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.0qJefsNJX86KVwJB]{spotlight}), restraint (@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.Dc9m2uVNYCwFURSX]{binders} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.51H6DFZEfiTzVdCs]{manacles}).
